title: 12/21 Fantasy Football Podcast: Start or Sit (AFC) - Ben, Hunt, Wallace & More
description:
We discuss an emerging QB who you need to take seriously in 2018 (3:00), then Dave, Jamey and Heath give you a player they love (4:40) and a player they want to avoid this week (8:35) ... Debating Ben Roethlisberger (10:30) and Kareem Hunt (13:30)! The guys have different expectations for these players. And which teams could be resting starters in Week 17 (20:35)? Also a music wager is made (22:24) ... BUF-NE (24:10), MIN-GB (29:10), DET-CIN (35:24), LAC-NYJ (41:18), LAR-TEN (46:48), PIT-HOU (51:51), MIA-KC (57:02), IND-BAL (1:01:15) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
